title: Kaspersky Internet Security 2017 (THREE USER / 1 YEAR)
summary: Kaspersky Anti-Virus is the first line of defense for your PC’s internet security system, enriched with the latest Kaspersky Lab detection technologies. It works ‘behind the scenes’ with intelligent scanning and small, frequent updates to deliver real-time and efficient protection from the latest threats and proactive protection from unknown dangers. It’s essential protection that won’t slow you down
specs: Product Description DetailsProtects you when you surf, socialize & shop – on PC & Mac, plus Android devices.SECURITYAward-winning protectionPERFORMANCEOptimized security – that won’t slow you downSIMPLICITYEasy-to-manage security – with online access PCMAC & MOBILE PCOne product is all you need – to protect multiple devicesPRIVACYIdentity protection & moreMONEYExtra security for online banking & shoppingPARENTAL CONTROLProtection for kids on PCs & Mac computers
